infos.value: Why would you throw your life away for me?
I intend to do no such thing.
No matter what debt I owe him, I would never risk my life for a man.
Don’t get the wrong idea. I’m not saying I see you as a woman or anything.
...Of course not.
Then I shall ask—what is it you want?
As I already said, I am a samurai from the east.
Don’t tell me...you’ve never heard of the eastern lands, nor of the samurai...?
I have heard...they are a force that belongs to no country.
Well, that’s not wrong.
To claim a country would only draw us into territorial disputes.
Our founders wanted no part of such things, wishing only to come together to practice the sword.
And that is why you only say “of the east”?
That’s right.
And you will help anyone in trouble. Is that also your master’s teachings?
You don’t look very troubled with a face like that, mind you.
But even so...when we take the time to listen, it becomes pretty clear who the villains are here.
What!? You dare call us villains!?
I guess I worded that a bit strongly.
How about “bad guys”?
Wh-why you...!
What is it you want?
...Huh?
As recompense for helping me.
I ask for nothing.
If I were to ask for something...it would only be for a long life with plenty of good drink. That’s all.
In that case, I will make you a promise.
If we make it out of this predicament, I will get you the best drink you have ever tasted.
Oh? I suddenly find myself very motivated.
